# duplocloud_tenant_metadata (Resource)

`duplocloud_tenant_metadata` manages a tenant metadata in Duplo.

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {

  tenant_id = "913a4498-db09-42c0-95b1-88ed26d87b83"

  tenant_metadata = {
    meta1 = {
      key   = "env"
      value = "dev"
      type  = "text"
    }
    meta2 = {
      key   = "team"
      value = "platform"
      type  = "aws_console"
    }
    meta3 = {
      key   = "cost-center"
      value = "12345"
      type  = "url"
    }
  }
}

resource "duplocloud_tenant_metadata" "meta" {
  for_each = local.tenant_metadata

  tenant_id = local.tenant_id
  key       = each.value.key
  value     = each.value.value
  type      = each.value.type
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key` (String) Specify key for tag.
- `tenant_id` (String) The GUID of the tenant that the tags will be created in.
- `type` (String) Specify type of metadata, Valid values are `text`, `url`, `aws_console`
- `value` (String) Specify value for tag.

### Optional

- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Example: Importing an existing tenant metadata
#  - *TENANT_ID* is the tenant GUID
#  - *TAG_KEY* is the tenant metadata key
#

terraform import duplocloud_tenant_metadata.meta TENANT_ID/TAG_KEY
```
